description: This file defines a PatientModel class responsible for data access and manipulation of patient records in a healthcare appointment management system. It includes methods for creating, retrieving, updating, listing, and deleting patient data from a database.

classes.name: PatientModel
classes.description: A class providing static methods to perform CRUD operations on patient records in the database.

methods.name: create({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id, fees_collected })
methods.description: Inserts a new patient record into the database and returns the created record.

methods.name: findById(id)
methods.description: Retrieves a patient record by its unique identifier, including the assigned doctor's name.

methods.name: list({ q, doctorId, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {})
methods.description: Retrieves a list of patients, with optional search query and doctor filter, supporting pagination.

methods.name: update(id, fields)
methods.description: Dynamically updates specified fields of a patient record identified by id.

methods.name: remove(id)
methods.description: Deletes a patient record from the database by its id.

ctags.name: create
ctags.pattern: /^  static async create({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id/
ctags.signature: ({ name, place, date_of_birth, reason_for_visit, gender, assigned_doctor_id, fees_collected })

ctags.name: list
ctags.pattern: /^  static async list({ q, doctorId, limit = 50, offset = 0 } = {}) {$/
